com.zebra.sdk.zmotif.job

Interface JobControlHelperUtilZmotif


  • public interface JobControlHelperUtilZmotif
    Interface for configuring job related parameters.

    Note: All Job settings must be set separately for each job.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void encryptGraphicsData(boolean encryptData)
      Indicates whether the job's graphics data should be encrypted using the key provided by setEncryptionKey(byte[]).
      Encryption option must be pre-configured on the printer.
      void encryptJobControlData(boolean encryptData)
      Indicates whether the job control data should be encrypted using the key provided by setEncryptionKey(byte[]).
      Encryption option must be pre-configured on the printer.

      Returns the current card destination location.

      Sets the flag indicating whether image data should be deleted following the current job completion.
      void setEnableOCPReprint(boolean enable)
      Sets whether or not the OCP Reprint button will be enabled.
      void setEncryptionKey(byte[] encryptionKey)
      Sets the 16 byte encryption used to encrypt job data between the printer and host.
      Encryption option must be pre-configured on the printer.

      Sets the 16 byte host authentication key used when sending a job to the printer.
      Host authentication option must be pre-configured on the printer.

      Sets the image orientation for the specified card side for the current job.

      Sets the magnetic encoding coercivity type for the current job.

      Sets the magnetic encoding data format for each track contained in the supplied Map.

      Sets the data character parity for each track for the current job.

      Sets the side of card to be magnetic encoded.

      Sets the type of magnetic encoding to perform for the current job.

      Sets the magnetic encoding type for each track contained in the specified Map object.

      Sets the sentinel formats for each supplied track for the current job.

      Sets the density value for each supplied track number for the current job.

      Sets whether magnetic encoding write verification should be performed for the current job.

      Sets the print optimization mode.

      use setSmartCardConfigurations(List)

      Configures smart card encoding for the current job.

    • Method Detail

      • setHostAuthenticationKey

        void setHostAuthenticationKey(byte[] authenticationKey)
                              throws SettingsException
        Sets the 16 byte host authentication key used when sending a job to the printer.
        • Host authentication option must be pre-configured on the printer.
        Parameters:
        authenticationKey - the 16 byte authentication key.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the authentication key is invalid.

      • setEncryptionKey

        void setEncryptionKey(byte[] encryptionKey)
                      throws SettingsException
        Sets the 16 byte encryption used to encrypt job data between the printer and host.
        • Encryption option must be pre-configured on the printer.
        Parameters:
        encryptionKey - the 16 byte encryptionKey key.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the encryptionKey key is invalid.

      • encryptJobControlData

        void encryptJobControlData(boolean encryptData)
        Indicates whether the job control data should be encrypted using the key provided by setEncryptionKey(byte[]).
        • Encryption option must be pre-configured on the printer.
        Parameters:
        encryptData - true to encrypt the job control data.

      • encryptGraphicsData

        void encryptGraphicsData(boolean encryptData)
        Indicates whether the job's graphics data should be encrypted using the key provided by setEncryptionKey(byte[]).
        • Encryption option must be pre-configured on the printer.
        Parameters:
        encryptData - true to encrypt the job's graphics data.

      • getCardThickness

        int getCardThickness()
                     throws SettingsException
        Returns the card thickness in mils.
        Returns:
        card thickness (mils).
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the setting does not exist, the device is busy, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

      • getCardType

        String getCardType()
                   throws SettingsException,
                          ConnectionException,
                          ZebraCardException
        Returns the currently selected card type.
        Returns:
        currently selected card type.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the card type.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.

      • getColorPreheatLevel

        int getColorPreheatLevel()
                         throws SettingsException
        Returns the preheat level for the color panels.
        Returns:
        color panels preheat level.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if there was an error parsing the response from the printer or there is an error communicating with the printer.

        Returns:
        image sharpening level.

      • getMagDataFormat

        java.util.Map<TrackNumber,DataFormat> getMagDataFormat()
                                                       throws SettingsException
        Returns the magnetic encoding data format for each track.
        Returns:
        Map containing the individual track DataFormat.
        • Key = Track number.
        • Value = Data format for magnetic encoding.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the magnetic encoder does not exist.

        Throws:

                          throws SettingsException

        side - side of card.
        Returns:
        true if monochrome panel overwrite has been selected.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the setting could not be retrieved.

      • setPrintOptimizationMode

        void setPrintOptimizationMode(PrintOptimizationMode optimizationMode)
                              throws SettingsException
        Sets the print optimization mode.
        • For ZMotif Series 9 printers only
        Parameters:
        optimizationMode - the print optimization mode for ZMotif Series 9 model printers.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the setting does not exist, the device is busy, or there is an error communicating with the printer.

                      SharpeningLevel sharpness)
                        throws SettingsException

        Parameters:
        side - side of card.
        sharpness - the level of sharpening to apply to the image data.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the setting is read only, does not exist, or if the setting could not be set.

                      boolean enable)
                        throws SettingsException

      • setMagConfiguration

        void setMagConfiguration(MagConfigInfo magConfig)
                         throws SettingsException,
                                ConnectionException,
                                ZebraCardException,
                                ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Method for configuring settings for a magnetic encoding job.
        Parameters:
        magConfig - instance containing details of the magnetic encoding job to perform.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs retrieving the magnetic configuration.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the magConfig is invalid.

      • setMagDataFormat

        void setMagDataFormat(java.util.Map<TrackNumber,DataFormat> dataFormat)
                      throws SettingsException,
                             ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Sets the magnetic encoding data format for each track contained in the supplied Map.
        Parameters:
        dataFormat - Map containing an entry for each track with the desired DataFormat.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The data format for magnetic encoding.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic encoding data.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if a printer error occurs.

        Parameters:
        side - side of card.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the card side for magnetic encoding.

      • setJobConfiguration

        void setJobConfiguration(JobConfigInfo jobConfig)
                         throws SettingsException,
                                ConnectionException,
                                ZebraCardException,
                                ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Method for configuring the current print job.
        Parameters:
        jobConfig - instance containing details of the job to be printed.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if the device is busy or there is an error communicating with the printer.
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the job configuration.
        ZebraCardException - if a printer error occurs.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the jobConfig is invalid.

      • setMagEncodingType

        void setMagEncodingType(MagEncodingType type)
                        throws SettingsException
        Sets the type of magnetic encoding to perform for the current job.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of magnetic encoding to perform.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic encoding type.

      • setMagEncodingType

        void setMagEncodingType(java.util.Map<TrackNumber,MagEncodingType> type)
                        throws SettingsException,
                               ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Sets the magnetic encoding type for each track contained in the specified Map object.
        Parameters:
        type - Map object containing an entry for each track with the desired MagEncodingType.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The magentic encoding type.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic encoding type.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the smartCardTypes is invalid.

      • setMagVerification

        void setMagVerification(boolean enabled)
                        throws SettingsException
        Sets whether magnetic encoding write verification should be performed for the current job.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to verify the magnetic encoding.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic verification.

      • setSmartCardConfiguration

        @Deprecated
void setSmartCardConfiguration(java.util.List<SmartCardType> smartCardTypes)
                               throws SettingsException,
                                      ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Deprecated. use setSmartCardConfigurations(List)
        Configures smart card encoding for the current job.
        ZMotif series 7, 8, and 9 printers only.
        Parameters:
        smartCardTypes - list of smartcard types for configuring a smart card encoding job.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the smart card configuration.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the printer model is invalid or if smartCardTypes is invalid.

      • setSmartCardConfigurations

        void setSmartCardConfigurations(java.util.List<String> smartCardTypes)
                                throws SettingsException,
                                       ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Configures smart card encoding for the current job.
        Parameters:
        smartCardTypes - list of smartcard types for configuring a smart card encoding job.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the smart card configuration.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the smartCardTypes is invalid.

      • getMagTrackDensity

        java.util.Map<TrackNumber,Integer> getMagTrackDensity()
                                                      throws SettingsException
        Gets the density value for each track.
        Returns:
        Map instance containing the density value for each TrackNumber.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The density value.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic track density.

      • setMagTrackDensity

        void setMagTrackDensity(java.util.Map<TrackNumber,Integer> density)
                        throws SettingsException,
                               ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Sets the density value for each supplied track number for the current job.
        Parameters:
        density - Map instance containing the density value for each TrackNumber.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The density value.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic track density.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the density map is invalid.

      • getMagSentinelFormat

        java.util.Map<TrackNumber,MagSentinel> getMagSentinelFormat()
                                                            throws SettingsException
        Gets the sentinel format values for each track.
        Returns:
        Map containing the MagSentinel information for each TrackNumber.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The individual magnetic encoder track sentinel configurations.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic sentinel format.

      • setMagSentinelFormat

        void setMagSentinelFormat(java.util.Map<TrackNumber,MagSentinel> sentinel)
                          throws SettingsException,
                                 ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Sets the sentinel formats for each supplied track for the current job.
        Parameters:
        sentinel - Map containing the MagSentinel information for each TrackNumber.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The individual magnetic encoder track sentinel configurations.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic sentinel format.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the sentinel map is invalid.

        java.util.Map<TrackNumber,Integer> getMagBitsPerCharacter()
                                                          throws SettingsException
        Gets the bits per character for each track number.
        Returns:
        Map instance containing the bits per character for each TrackNumber.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The magnetic bits per character.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic bits per character.

                            throws SettingsException,
                                   ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Sets the bits per character for each track.
        Parameters:
        bitsPerChar - Map instance containing the bits per character for each TrackNumber.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = The magnetic bits per character.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic bits per character.

      • getMagDataParity

        java.util.Map<TrackNumber,DataCharParity> getMagDataParity()
                                                           throws SettingsException
        Gets the data parity for each track.
        Returns:
        Map instance containing the TrackNumber and DataCharParity for each track.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = the data character parity for magnetic encoding.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while retrieving the magnetic data parity.

      • setMagDataParity

        void setMagDataParity(java.util.Map<TrackNumber,DataCharParity> parity)
                      throws SettingsException,
                             ZebraIllegalArgumentException
        Sets the data character parity for each track for the current job.
        Parameters:
        parity - Map instance containing the TrackNumber and DataCharParity instance.
        • Key = The track of the magnetic card to be written to/read from.
        • Value = the data character parity for magnetic encoding.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if an error occurs while setting the magnetic data parity.
        ZebraIllegalArgumentException - if the parity map is invalid.

      • getPrintOptimizationMode

        PrintOptimizationMode getPrintOptimizationMode()
                                               throws SettingsException
        Gets the print optimization mode.
        • For ZMotif Series 9 printers only
        Returns:
        the print optimization mode for ZMotif Series 9 model printers.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - if the setting does not exist, the device is busy, or there is an error communicating with the printer.
